sig_info: A stricter training regimen allows Karnak to begin the fight with 1 Focus Charge. Additionally, his Basic Attacks are enhanced in the following ways:
Ignore 25 to 90% of the opponent’s positive Physical Resistance.
Striking the opponent’s Block grants Karnak 60 to 90% of the Power an unblocked attack would have granted.
